Schema: {"typeName":"NewRelic::Alert::AlertsPolicy","description":"Manage New Relic AlertsPolicy","sourceUrl":"https://github.com/aws-ia/cloudformation-newrelic-resource-providers.git","documentationUrl":"https://github.com/aws-ia/cloudformation-newrelic-resource-providers","typeConfiguration":{"properties":{"NewRelicAccess":{"$ref":"#/definitions/NewRelicAccess"}},"additionalProperties":false,"required":["NewRelicAccess"]},"definitions":{"NewRelicAccess":{"type":"object","properties":{"Endpoint":{"type":"string","description":"Endpoint to the NerdGraph API."},"ApiKey":{"type":"string","description":"API key for the New Relic NerdGraph."}},"required":["Endpoint","ApiKey"],"additionalProperties":false},"AlertsPolicyInput":{"type":"object","properties":{"Name":{"type":"string","description":"Name of the alerts policy."},"IncidentPreference":{"type":"string","enum":["PER_CONDITION","PER_CONDITION_AND_TARGET","PER_POLICY"]}},"additionalProperties":false}},"properties":{"AccountId":{"type":"integer","description":"Account ID the alerts policy should belong to."},"AlertsPolicyId":{"type":"integer","description":"Alerts Policy ID."},"AlertsPolicy":{"$ref":"#/definitions/AlertsPolicyInput"}},"additionalProperties":false,"tagging":{"taggable":false},"required":["AccountId","AlertsPolicy"],"createOnlyProperties":["/properties/AccountId"],"readOnlyProperties":["/properties/AlertsPolicyId"],"primaryIdentifier":["/properties/AccountId","/properties/AlertsPolicyId"],"handlers":{"create":{"permissions":[]},"read":{"permissions":[]},"update":{"permissions":[]},"delete":{"permissions":[]},"list":{"permissions":[]}}}
